description: By Paul Sylvain The Machias School Board last week submitted its proposed 2025-26 budget to town officials, representing an overall increase of around 3.15%, which is up $265,157 to $8,674,699, from $8,409,542 last year. Janet Mills’ hard-line stand allowing transgenders born as males to play in girls’ sports in Maine’s schools.
